verses.verse: Then all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves to <S%H1732>David<s%> unto <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6106>Behold<s%>, we are thy bone and thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

In <S%H8543>times<s%> <S%H8032>past<s%>, even when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%>, it was thou that leddest <S%H3318>out<s%> and broughtest <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7462>thee<s%>, Thou shalt be shepherd of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H1571>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

So all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> (the same is <S%H2982>Jebus<s%>); and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, were there.

And the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2982>Jebus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H1732>hither<s%>. Nevertheless David <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; the same is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Whosoever <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> shall be <S%H7218>chief<s%> and <S%H8269>captain<s%>. And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%>, and was made <S%H7218>chief<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4679>stronghold<s%>; therefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, from <S%H4407>Millo<s%> even round <S%H5439>about<s%>; and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H2421>repaired<s%> the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>waxed<s%> <S%H1980>greater<s%> and <S%H1419>greater<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of hosts was with <S%H6635>him<s%>.

Now these are the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2388>had<s%>, who showed themselves strong with him in his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, together with all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to make him <S%H4427>king<s%>, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And this is the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3434>had<s%>: Jashobeam, the son of a <S%H2453>Hachmonite<s%>, the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7991>thirty<s%>; he lifted <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> against <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2491>slew<s%> them at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%>.
And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%>, the <S%H266>Ahohite<s%>, who was one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

He was with <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H6450>Pasdammim<s%>, and there the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, where was a <S%H2513>plot<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And they <S%H3320>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2513>plot<s%>, and <S%H5337>defended<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>, and slew the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> them by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%>.

And <S%H7969>three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> men went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, into the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam<s%>; and the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was then in the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%>, and the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was then in <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>longed<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Oh that one would give me <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>, which is by the <S%H8179>gate<s%>!

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> brake <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>, that was by the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H935>it<s%>, and brought it to <S%H1732>David<s%>: but <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H5258>thereof<s%>, but poured it out unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> it <S%H6213>me<s%>, that I should do <S%H2063>this<s%>: shall I <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> that have put their lives in <S%H5315>jeopardy<s%>? for with the jeopardy of their <S%H5315>lives<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H14>it<s%>. Therefore he would not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>. These things did the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

And <S%H52>Abishai<s%>, the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, he was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7969>three<s%>; for he lifted <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> against <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2491>slew<s%> <S%H8034>them<s%>, and had a name among the <S%H7969>three<s%>.
Of the <S%H7969>three<s%>, he was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than the <S%H8147>two<s%>, and was made their <S%H8269>captain<s%>: howbeit he <S%H935>attained<s%> not to the first <S%H7969>three<s%>.

Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6909>Kabzeel<s%>, who had done <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H6467>deeds<s%>, he <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H739>sons<s%> of Ariel of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: he went <S%H3381>down<s%> also and <S%H5221>slew<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the midst of a <S%H953>pit<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7950>snow<s%>.

And he <S%H5221>slew<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4060>stature<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H4713>high<s%>; and in the Egyptian's <S%H3027>hand<s%> was a <S%H2595>spear<s%> like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>beam<s%>; and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to him with a <S%H7626>staff<s%>, and <S%H1497>plucked<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> out of the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear<s%>.
These things <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, and had a <S%H8034>name<s%> among the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

Behold <S%H2009><s%>, he was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>, but he <S%H935>attained<s%> not to the first <S%H7969>three<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him over his <S%H4928>guard<s%>.

Also the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H2428>armies<s%>: <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>,
Shammoth <S%H8054><s%> the <S%H2033>Harorite<s%>, <S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite<s%>,
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite<s%>, <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite<s%>,
Sibbecai <S%H5444><s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%>, <S%H5866>Ilai<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite<s%>,
Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>, <S%H2466>Heled<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1196>Baanah<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>,
Ithai <S%H863><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%>,
Hurai <S%H2360><s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash<s%>, <S%H22>Abiel<s%> the <S%H6164>Arbathite<s%>,
Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the <S%H978>Baharumite<s%>, <S%H455>Eliahba<s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite<s%>,
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2044>Hashem<s%> the <S%H1493>Gizonite<s%>, <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7681>Shagee<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite<s%>,
Ahiam <S%H279><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7940>Sacar<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite<s%>, <S%H465>Eliphal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H218>Ur<s%>,
Hepher <S%H2660><s%> the <S%H4382>Mecherathite<s%>, <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite<s%>,
Hezro <S%H2695><s%> the <S%H3761>Carmelite<s%>, <S%H5293>Naarai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H229>Ezbai<s%>,
360 <S%H3100><s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, <S%H4006>Mibhar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1905>Hagri<s%>,
Zelek <S%H6768><s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%>, <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H1307>Berothite<s%>, the <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%>,
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite<s%>, <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite<s%>,
Uriah <S%H223><s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H304>Ahlai<s%>,
Adina <S%H5721><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7877>Shiza<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenite<s%>, a <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and thirty with <S%H7970>him<s%>,
Hanan <S%H2605><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah<s%>, and <S%H3146>Joshaphat<s%> the <S%H4981>Mithnite<s%>,
Uzzia <S%H5814><s%> the <S%H6254>Ashterathite<s%>, <S%H8091>Shama<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2369>Hotham<s%> the <S%H6200>Aroerite<s%>,
Jediael <S%H3043><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8113>Shimri<s%>, and <S%H3109>Joha<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, the <S%H8491>Tizite<s%>,
Eliel <S%H447><s%> the <S%H4233>Mahavite<s%>, and <S%H3403>Jeribai<s%>, and <S%H3145>Joshaviah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H493>Elnaam<s%>, and <S%H3495>Ithmah<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabite<s%>,
Eliel <S%H447><s%>, and <S%H5744>Obed<s%>, and <S%H3300>Jaasiel<s%> the <S%H4677>Mezobaite<s%>.
